description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 3/05/2007

Stephanie pays Nick a visit and tells him that Brooke is the woman for him, not Taylor.  She tells Nick that Ridge and Brooke won’t be getting married because she plans to expose Brooke’s secrets.  Meanwhile, Brooke tells Rick that she wants to tell Ridge about his and Phoebe’s relationship because she doesn’t want to lie anymore.  Rick assures Brooke that he and Phoebe will be more careful in keeping their secret and they won’t get caught.  Stephanie confronts Brooke about keeping the secret of Rick and Phoebe and vows to get proof.  Stephanie secretly turns the intercom on at work so that she can eavesdrop on Rick and Phoebe, and she hears their secret plan to meet up at the Big Bear cabin to be alone.
